testcase.name: test_get_templates_unauthorized

failure.message:
AssertionError: Expected 403, got 200: {"templates":[{"id":"dues_reminder_day3","body":"Hello {{member_name}},

This is a friendly reminder that your monthly dues payment for {{month}} {{year}} has not been received.

Please submit your payment at your earliest convenience.

If you have already made your payment, please disregard this message.

Thank you,
Brothers of the Highway","created_at":"2026-01-11T00:49:55.653Z","day_trigger":3,"is_active":true,"name":"Day 3 - First Reminder","subject":"Friendly Reminder: Dues Payment Due","updated_at":"2026-01-11T00:49:55.653Z"},{"id":"dues_reminder_day8","body":"Hello {{member_name}},

This is a second reminder that your monthly dues for {{month}} {{year}} remain unpaid.

Your dues are now 8 days overdue. Please submit your payment as soon as possible to remain in good standing.

If you are experiencing financial difficulties, please reach out to your chapter SEC.

Thank you,
Brothers of the Highway","created_at":"2026-01-11T00:49:55.653Z","day_trigger":8,"is_active":true,"name":"Day 8 - Second Reminder","subject":"Second Notice: Dues Payment Overdue","updated_at":"2026-01-11T00:49:55.653Z"},{"id":"dues_reminder_day10","body":"Hello {{member_name}},

Your monthly dues for {{month}} {{year}} are now 10 days overdue.

As per our bylaws, your member permissions have been temporarily suspended until your dues are brought current.

Please submit your payment immediately to restore your full membership privileges.

If you have questions or concerns, please contact your chapter SEC.

Thank you,
Brothers of the Highway","created_at":"2026-01-11T00:49:55.653Z","day_trigger":10,"is_active":true,"name":"Day 10 - Final Notice & Suspension","subject":"URGENT: Dues 10 Days Overdue - Permissions Suspended","updated_at":"2026-01-11T00:49:55.653Z"}]}
assert 200 == 403
 +  where 200 = <Response [200]>.status_code
